VARIABLES.NAME: parameters
VARIABLES.DESCRIPTION: The parameters for a OpenVPN Client to use, null values means that the parameter does not require a value

VARIABLES.NAME: certificate_authority
VARIABLES.DESCRIPTION: The certificate authority of for the VPN Server

VARIABLES.NAME: certificate_authority_b64
VARIABLES.DESCRIPTION: The same as certificate_authority but with the contents base64 encoded

VARIABLES.NAME: certificate
VARIABLES.DESCRIPTION: The certificate of the VPN Server

VARIABLES.NAME: certificate_b64
VARIABLES.DESCRIPTION: The same as certificate but with the contents base64 encoded

VARIABLES.NAME: key
VARIABLES.DESCRIPTION: Private RSA Key for the VPN Server

VARIABLES.NAME: key_b64
VARIABLES.DESCRIPTION: The same as key but with the contents base64 encoded

VARIABLES.NAME: ovpn_configuration
VARIABLES.DESCRIPTION: The full contents of the .ovpn file including all the certificates and parameters to connect
